definition: A famous teacher trains a fine student (idiom). A cultured man will have a deep influence on his successors.
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
teacher/master/expert/model/army division/(old) troops/to dispatch troops
surname Shi

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
surname Tu

sentences.english: People all say "The famous master has no greats students", I only disagree.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说“名师出高徒”，我独不以为然。

sentences.english: The famous teacher, appntice, good teachers course will teach the students.
sentences.chinese: 所为名师出高徒，好教师当然会教出好学生。

definition: there are no poor soldiers under a good general (idiom)
pinyin: qiang2 jiang4 shou3 xia4 wu2 ruo4 bing1

definition: brilliant student
lit. the color blue is made out of indigo but is more vivid than indigo (idiom)/fig. the student surpasses the master
pinyin: qing1 chu1 yu2 lan2 er2 sheng4 yu2 lan2

definition: lit. father a lion, son cannot be a dog (honorific); With a distinguished father such as you, the son is sure to do well./like father, like son
lit. teacher for one day, father for ever (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ri4 wei2 shi1 , zhong1 shen1 wei2 fu4

definition: the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time
authentic tradition/handed-down teachings or techniques
the sage presents as an ordinary person (idiom)
however strong you are, there is always someone stronger (idiom)/there is always sth more to learn/never be satisfied to rest on your laurels/there is no room for complacency
pinyin: qiang2 zhong1 zi4 you3 qiang2 zhong1 shou3

definition: when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
(idiom) to teach in line with the student's ability
there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: solid learning/real ability and learning/genuine talent
you can't judge a person by appearance (idiom)/you can't judge a book by its cover/often in combination 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量[ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2]
it's always good to have more skills (idiom)
like father, like son (idiom)
